lead_paragraph: Wallabies flanker David Pocock has issued an open apology for the foul play that earned him a ban this week, admitting he had let down his team mates, and thanked rugby's governing bodies for trying to make the game safer.

headline.print_headline: Australia's Pocock Apologises After Ban for Foul Play
headline.main: Australia's Pocock Apologises After Ban for Foul Play

snippet: Wallabies flanker David Pocock has issued an open apology for the foul play that earned him a ban this week, admitting he had let down his team mates, and thanked rugby's governing bodies for trying to make the game safer....
